name: HireWheel for Developers
body:
Here at HireWheel, we make use of many free and open technologies, and thus we are excited to give back to the open source community. Here is the software we currently have available to the public here on GitHub:

* [OData to MySQL](https://github.com/HireWheel/odata-mysql): A command-line utility for downloading from an OData server into a MySQL database

Stay tuned for more open source projects and other news in the near future by following us on Twitter: [@HireWheel](https://twitter.com/hirewheel)

***

We are looking to expand development team! If you are a developer interested in our company, please see [our listings on AngelList](https://angel.co/hirewheel) for more information.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
